local_intent: Perceive the red plate, approach and align to placement pose, execute PlaceAt using 'place_pose', and verify contact.
assumptions: place_pose blackboard key has been set earlier (SetBlackboard in global BT).
Red plate is reachable and detectable from current robot pose.
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase of the global BT: detects target red_plate, aligns, uses existing place_pose to execute PlaceAt with light press, and verifies contact consistent with task description.
